publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1451 Mr Kenneth Macintosh: Heart Week 5 to 13 June 2004-That the Parliament congratulates the British Heart Foundation on its Heart Week campaign, the Big Red Fightback, from 5 to 13 June 2004, against coronary heart disease (CHD); notes that, while heart disease rates in Scotland are falling, more people than ever before are living with the disease; further notes that lack of physical activity is one of the key causes of CHD, yet only around one in three men and one in four women achieves the recommended 30 minutes of exercise, five times a week, and therefore believes that the Heart Week campaign's focus on encouraging people to increase their level of physical exercise will be an important contribution to fighting the causes of heart disease in Scotland.

S2M-1451 Heart Week 5 to 13 June 2004 (lodged on 9 June 2004) Karen Gillon*, Kate Maclean*, Robin Harper*, Bruce Crawford*, Mary Scanlon*, Christine May*, Frances Curran*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Richard Lochhead*, Helen Eadie*, Sarah Boyack*, Christine Grahame*, Bristow Muldoon*, Murdo Fraser*, Murray Tosh*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Rob Gibson*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Michael McMahon*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Tricia Marwick*, Mr David Davidson*

S2M-1451 Mr Kenneth Macintosh: Heart Week 5 to 13 June 2004-That the Parliament congratulates the British Heart Foundation on its Heart Week campaign, the Big Red Fightback, from 5 to 13 June 2004, against coronary heart disease (CHD); notes that, while heart disease rates in Scotland are falling, more people than ever before are living with the disease; further notes that lack of physical activity is one of the key causes of CHD, yet only around one in three men and one in four women achieves the recommended 30 minutes of exercise, five times a week, and therefore believes that the Heart Week campaign's focus on encouraging people to increase their level of physical exercise will be an important contribution to fighting the causes of heart disease in Scotland. Supported by: Karen Gillon, Kate Maclean, Robin Harper, Bruce Crawford, Mary Scanlon, Christine May, Frances Curran, Mr Jamie Stone, Richard Lochhead, Helen Eadie, Sarah Boyack, Christine Grahame, Bristow Muldoon, Murdo Fraser, Murray Tosh, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Rob Gibson, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Mr Mark Ruskell, Michael McMahon, Ms Wendy Alexander, Tricia Marwick, Mr David Davidson, Linda Fabiani*, Elaine Smith*, Jackie Baillie*, Eleanor Scott*, Mike Pringle*, John Swinburne*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-1451 Heart Week 5 to 13 June 2004 (lodged on 9 June 2004) David Mundell*, Margaret Jamieson*, Stewart Stevenson*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Dr Jean Turner*

S2M-1451 Heart Week 5 to 13 June 2004 (lodged on 9 June 2004) Nora Radcliffe*, Shiona Baird*, Irene Oldfather*, Mr Brian Monteith*
S2M-1451 Heart Week 5 to 13 June 2004 (lodged on 9 June 2004) Cathie Craigie*
S2M-1451 Heart Week 5 to 13 June 2004 (lodged on 9 June 2004) Pauline McNeill*
